INTRODUCTION

Welcome to Farmer's Universe! Farmer's Universe is a casual farming-simulation game where you are (obviously) growing plants and growing your farm to other planets! This game was made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2023.

FEATURES

This game offers:

  • Planting System
  • Research System
  • Travel System
  • Resource Transport System
  • Save System (currently only for desktop)
  • Upgrades System
  • 6 Different Plants
  • 3 Different Planets
GAMEPLAY

The gameplay of the game is quite simple, you start at a farm on earth, plant your first wheat, then discover other plants after you reach a certain research point. When you have enough research points, you can build a rocket and fly to other planets.  After that, plant your plants on another planet's farm, and maintain plant resources to send back to earth.

Play in a casual pace, plant plants in a cozy environment, discover more plants, build rocket to explore other planets, maintain plant resources.

MORE INFO Controls

[Left Click] Plant
[Right Click] Harvest
